data.actual_result: You're scrolled back to the bottom of chat
data.expected_result: Your current scrolled position is kept in place
data.short_description: Receiving a message in a channel you're scrolled up in, but no currently viewing scrolls you back to the bottom of chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel with enough messages to scroll up in - Scroll up in the chat (Note: If the "Jump To Present" banner is visible, you're too high and it won't reproduce) - Switch to another channel/server - Have another user send a new message into the channel you're currently scrolled up in - Go back into the channel and observe how you're now at the bottom
